name: Mushroom Exorcist
description:
This game was made for Ludum Dare 45. In this game you are a brave girl whose goal is to kill the Wolf demon living in a forest. In the beginning, you have nothing. To kill the Wolf, you need to collect magical mushrooms and insert them into artifacts, 3 mushrooms for every artifact. After activating all the artifacts, all you need to do is to trap the Wolf between artifacts. Beware, if the Wolf hits you, you die! Press 'E' to collect mushrooms and insert them into artifacts.

Unfortunately, we didn't have enough time to finish the game, but we hope you will enjoy it nevertheless!

Update: higher quality version
